name: mrcepid-bcfsplitter
title: BCFSplitter
summary: Normalises and splits a VCF into smaller BCFs

inputSpec.name: input_vcfs
inputSpec.label: list of input vcf.gz file(s)
inputSpec.help: List of input VCF files to split.

inputSpec.name: chunk_size
inputSpec.label: number of variants per split output .bcf
inputSpec.help: The number of variants to include per-output BCF produced by this applet. See README for how this works in practice [5000].

inputSpec.name: output_name
inputSpec.label: Output name for info files
inputSpec.help: Additional string to use when creating information files (run info, skipped_sites). This does NOT modify the name of split VCF files [None].

inputSpec.name: alt_allele_threshold
inputSpec.label: alt allele filtering threshold
inputSpec.help: The maximum number of alternate alleles in a single variant before filtering a site. Uses '>' (greater than) to determine threshold [99999].

outputSpec.name: skipped_sites
outputSpec.label: Sites skipped due to alt_allele_threshold input parameter
outputSpec.help: A .tsv file containing sites with > alt_allele_threshold alternate alleles.
